name: Lil' Tooth Bug
description:
Lil' Tooth Bug is a game inspired by Mr Driller. You'll venture the World as a tooth bug, ready to make cavities through the teeth!

Can you make it all the way to the gums?

Gameplay

Acid your way down the tooth, avoid fluoride blocks [F], as they will consume your sugar level below healthy...  Candy on the other hand is just the opposite, eat away and your Lil' Tooth Bug will be happy! Also be careful as your cavities can make parts of the tooth to collapse.

Controls

Movement and aiming:  wasd, arrow keys or joystick.

Acid attack:  ctrl, space bar or joystick button 0

Pause: alt or joystick button 1

Return to menu: esc or joystick  button 10

Remember to play Full Screen (Small button in the lower right corner)

Enjoy!
